page.title: 11 LANGUAGE
page.content: Most of the residents of the Llanferres & Loggerheads area speak English even though they have the ability to speak Welsh.Few have the ability to speak an overseas language,with the exception of one or two who spoke Latin and German. The majority had an English education,while at the same time learning such languages as Latin,French and German.Intrest in Adult Language courses was low. Very few residents were English immigrants-the majority were Welsh. The few immigrants saw no point in learning Welsh,as they saw no practical use in doing so.
